answerText: "Mademoiselle Fifi" [10] Name the French author of "Mademoiselle Fifi" who also wrote "Ball of Fat" and other short stories.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Illinois A and Missouri State A and University of South Carolina A | 19 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title of this story refers to the nickname of Second Lieutenand Wilhelm von Eyrick given to him by his fellow Prussian soldiers due to Wilhelm's feminine appearance.  [10] Name this story in which Wilhelm is killed by the prostitute Rachel the Jewess during the Prussian occupation of Urville.
